current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To ensure that the United States Government in no way recognizes Russia's annexation of Crimea.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: United States policy against recognition of annexation

text.#text:
It is the policy of the United States Government not to recognize the de jure or de facto
			 sovereignty of the Russian Federation over  Crimea, its airspace, or its
			 territorial waters.

No Federal department or agency may  take any action that recognizes or implies recognition of
			 sovereignty of the Russian Federation over  Crimea, its airspace, or its
			 territorial waters.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not print any map, document, record, or other paper of the
			 United States	 portraying or otherwise indicating Crimea as part of the
			 territory of the Russian Federation.

header.#text: Prohibition against documents portraying Crimea as part of Russian Federation

text.#text:
No Federal department or agency may  take any action to facilitate, finance, or guarantee any
			 investment in Crimea that involves any official or entity of the
			 Government of the Russian Federation or any business, bank, or other
			 financial entity whose headquarters or principal place of business is
			 located in the Russian Federation.

header.#text: Prohibition on facilitating certain investments in Crimea

header.#text: Opposition to international financial institution loans with Russian involvement

text.#text:
any
			 official or entity of the Government of the Russian Federation; or

any

shall affirm the United States policy of not
			 recognizing the de jure or de facto
			 sovereignty of the Russian Federation over  Crimea, its airspace, or its

header.#text: Department of Justice affirmation of non-recognition of annexation

text.#text:
A vessel that is documented under the laws of a foreign country may not enter a port of the United
			 States if—

header.#text: Denial of entry to United States ports of vessels from Crimea with Russian cargo

text.#text: the vessel is arriving from a port in Crimea; and

the vessel is transporting goods for which export documents are issued or approved by the customs
			 authorities of the Russian Federation.

header.#text: Non-recognition of Russian sovereignty over Crimean territory, airspace, or territorial waters

			  Crimea, its airspace, or its

header.#text: Prohibition on certain assistance to countries that recognize Russian sovereignty over Crimea
